title: Stay connected! Our units have high speed internet access!
posting_body: ['Brooks Crossing Apartments', 'Visit our community today!', '8050 Taylor Road Riverdale, GA 30274', 'show contact info', 'Unit Rates:', '$1481/month', 'Unit Type:', '2-BR 1-BA', 'Unit Size:', '938 sq ft', 'Lease Terms:', '6-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Pet Policy:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'What you’ll find in our community:', '❖ Business Center', '❖ Clubhouse', '❖ Fitness Center', '❖ Gated', '❖ Maintenance on site', '❖ Playground', '❖ Property Manager on Site', '❖ Smoke Free', '❖ Sparkling Pool', '❖ Wi-Fi at Pool and Clubhouse', '❖ Covered Parking', '❖ Fax/Copy Services', '❖ Laundry Facilities', '❖ Monthly Resident Events', '❖ Multi Use Room', '❖ Package Service', '❖ Preferred Employer Discounts Available', '❖ Resident Referral Bonuses', '❖ Sports Courts', '❖ Tennis Court', 'Description:', 'We are also just a few miles from major interstates and a short commute to Downtown Atlanta.', 'We invite you to call us for more information or come by Brooks Crossing Apartments and see why our residents love to call us home!', 'We look forward to showing you around our community.', 'This unit comes with:', '❖ Air Conditioning', '❖ Cable Ready', '❖ Ceiling Fans', '❖ Deck', '❖ Dishwasher', '❖ Disposal', '❖ Fireplace', '❖ Freezer', '❖ Heating', '❖ High Speed Internet Access', '❖ Range', '❖ Refrigerator', '❖ Tub/Shower', '❖ Vaulted Ceilings', '❖ Walk-In Closets', '❖ Washer/Dryer Hookup', '❖ Wi-Fi', '❖ Window Coverings', 'Call or visit our website to schedule a personal tour!', 'Office Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Property Management:', 'Ventron Management', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'F9AA760B60A24F']
